name: Incredible SpiderHero Fighting
description:
Are your ready for great superhero anti criminal adventure? Only you will be able to protect civilians !!! Be ready to rob, kill, shoot and fight all dangerous criminals and mafia and save the vice city ! Stealing auto cars, racing through streets, and shooting down gangsters. Do you have enough guts to rise to the top of the criminals and mafia ? Try out all the supercars and bikes. Make stunts on a bmx or find an ultimate F-90 and Spider in City Battle tank or devastating battle helicopter.
Would you be able to defeat these super villains in super city of super hero games?
